statements: SELECT date, description FROM PersonalFinanceTransactions WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM PersonalFinanceTransactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT description, COUNT(*) FROM PersonalFinanceTransactions GROUP BY description;
SELECT SUM(amount) FROM PersonalFinanceTransactions WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-31';
SELECT * FROM PersonalFinanceTransactions WHERE description LIKE '%salary%';
SELECT * FROM PersonalFinanceTransactions WHERE amount >= 500 AND amount <= 1000;
SELECT * FROM PersonalFinanceTransactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 200 AND 500;
SELECT AVG(amount) FROM PersonalFinanceTransactions WHERE description = 'rent';
SELECT * FROM PersonalFinanceTransactions WHERE description IN ('salary', 'rent');
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'jane_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '1234';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id IN ('1234', '5678');
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%doe%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE password IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'alice' AND email = 'alice@gmail.com';
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE budget < 500;
SELECT id, name, email FROM users WHERE budget BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, name, date_of_birth FROM users
SELECT user_id, account_type, balance FROM accounts
SELECT account_id, transaction_type, amount FROM transactions
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions
SELECT * FROM users JOIN accounts ON users.id = accounts.user_id
SELECT * FROM users JOIN accounts ON users.id = accounts.user_id JOIN transactions ON accounts.account_id = transactions.account_id
SELECT name, account_type, balance, transaction_type FROM users JOIN accounts ON users.id = accounts.user_id JOIN transactions ON accounts.account_id = transactions.account_id
SELECT * FROM categories WHERE parent_category_id IS NULL
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY name
SELECT * FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT id, name, email FROM users WHERE id = 1
SELECT account_id, transaction_type, amount FROM transactions WHERE id = 1
SELECT user_id, category_id, amount FROM budget WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM users JOIN accounts ON users.id = accounts.user_id
SELECT * FROM categories WHERE category_name LIKE '%food%'
SELECT * FROM budget WHERE month = 1 AND year = 2022
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY name DESC
